full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO LEGS PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B (ZHES PA DE LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES JANG JONG CHEN PO CHIN WANG GI SRAS LHA BTZUN SHRI GE THU BLA MA'I GRVA BA, ,DGE TSUL DBANG RGYAL ZHES BGYI BA BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA GYI NA BA @012A *, ,BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS PA 'DIR LHAG CHAD MA DAG PA'I NYES SKYON BLA MA DPA' BO MKHA' 'GRO DANG DAM CAN 'KHOR BCAS PA BZOD PAR GSOL, ,BZOD CING NGES PAS TSANGS PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE DGE BA CUNG ZAD YOD NA YIS BDAG DANG BSKUL BA PO LA SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD TSE 'DIR GNOD CING 'CHE BAR BYED PA'I 'GAL RKYEN BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHING MTHAR THUG LA BYANG CHUB SNYING PO'I GO 'PHANG THOB PA'I GROGS MDZOD PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
